ChemBio Hub

ChemBio Hub platform is down for maintenance

We are currently upgrading the ChemBio Hub platform to provide better functionality for our users. This means that it is offline and you will be unable to log in to the platform.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and will aim to keep any downtime to a minimum.

If you continue to see this message for a prolonged period of time, please contact us to get a status update and we will provide you with as much information as possible.

Thank you for your patience
The ChemBio Hub Team
